specificHandLegend: Specific hand in question on chart
readyToPlay: Ready to hit the tables? You can tweak the challenge or jump right in with your saved settings.
choosePath: Your poker adventure starts now! Choose your path:
rules1: You'll be presented with a poker hand with a specific situation.
rules2: Based on the hand and situation, choose the best preflop action.
rules3: You have three lives. Incorrect decisions cost one life.
rules4: Your streak increases with correct answers, giving score bonuses.
rules5: The game ends when you run out of lives or reach the maximum score.
rules6: After the game ends you'll be shown the incorrect decisions made by you. So you can review and improve. Flip those cards to see more details.
rules7: You can set customizable ranges and game difficulty in settings.
shortcutAutoSaveInfo: Changes are saved automatically. Press Esc or click away to close.

decentScore: Nice job! That's a solid score!
Good game! You're getting the hang of it!

defaultMessages: Good effort! Ready for another round?
Thanks for playing! Try to beat your score next time!
